contents.text: Thank you for calling BuildZoom in San Francisco, your free resource for finding trusted contractors.
To inquire about hiring a contractor for your project, press 1.
To speak with a live advisor about selecting the right contractor, press 1.
Please hold and we will connect you with a project specialist shortly.

navigationGoals: I need to speak with a project specialist to help me choose the right contractor for my renovation.
I’d like to speak with an advisor about finding a reliable contractor to adapt my home for my mobility needs.
I need to speak with a specialist to discuss vetting contractors using performance metrics.
I’d like to speak with someone about hiring a trusted contractor to build a wheelchair ramp at my home.
Get advice on choosing a contractor for converting my garage into a study lab

contents.text: For assistance with an existing project quote, press 2.
One moment please while we retrieve your quote details.

navigationGoals: I need assistance reviewing the quote I received for my current remodeling project.
I need help reviewing and updating the quote I received for installing a wheelchair ramp.
I want to retrieve my existing project quote and review the detailed cost breakdown.
I need help reviewing the quote I received for installing new safety handrails in my bathroom.
Clarify the cost breakdown on my home lab renovation quote

contents.text: If you’re an experienced contractor and want to join BuildZoom, press 2.
To learn how to partner with BuildZoom as a contractor, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our contractor onboarding team.

navigationGoals: I’m an experienced contractor looking for details on how to join BuildZoom as a partner.
I want to learn how to join BuildZoom as a contractor and understand the onboarding requirements.
I’m an experienced contractor looking to onboard and integrate via your partner API.
I’m a contractor and want to learn how to sign up with BuildZoom to list my services.
Learn the process to register as a contractor on BuildZoom

contents.text: For help with your contractor account or profile, press 2.
Connecting you to contractor support. Please hold.

navigationGoals: I need support with accessing and updating my contractor account profile.
I need assistance updating my contractor profile, including adding my military service credentials.
I need technical support to update my contractor profile and certification data.
I need assistance updating my contractor account details and profile on BuildZoom.
Resolve an issue updating details in my contractor profile
